alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 31 at 4:41AM CDT until May 31 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kansas and northeast Kansas, including the following counties, in east central Kansas, Shawnee. In northeast Kansas, Jackson. * WHEN...Until 800 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 441 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Topeka, Rossville, Tecumseh, Richland, Silver Lake, Delia, Willard, Pauline and Berryton.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
